website_summaries.verdict: You can plant these peat pots directly in the ground because they biodegrade in the soil.
pros: You do not have to disturb your roots when you put it in the ground
cons: These may start biodegrading in your greenhouse if the conditions are too wet

customer_reviews.title: Decompose too easily and gives off a smell
customer_reviews.text: While it's desirable to have the tray decompose and become part of the root ball when I transplant the plant into a pot, this tray simply decomposes too easily. After a couple mild watering, the tray becomes moldy and soggy, and gives off a strong smell (it actually smells right out of the box).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bunburyist

customer_reviews.title: but I would not recommend it. I'd use plastic starter trays in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I found I couldn't just plant these in soil without ripping up the sides and bottoms so that the roots could spread. I ended up with a plant that grew very slowly because of this. They advertise that you can just put the whole thing into the bigger container or the ground, but I would not recommend it. I'd use plastic starter trays in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great! However
customer_reviews.text: Works great! However, I didn't really realize when you water things you're planting in these that they're kinda porous. Would suggest using these inside another container (plastic starter containers, or ceramic planters, etc) since they too will absorb water and the outside of them will feel wet to the touch. But otherwise I love them so far for starting a garden!
customer_reviews.author: Thackary

customer_reviews.title: Expensive junk
customer_reviews.text: Misleading description,It says 100 peat pots included ..nope jut cardboard pots for 20 bucks? do not buy this.AND they have not had the courtesy to change the description bad seller and product.still says 100 peat pods included THEY ARE NOT.Still advertising that it comes with peat pots.REALLY?
customer_reviews.author: Indaskys

customer_reviews.title: Love the trays
customer_reviews.text: Love the trays. They arrived on time and totally intact. One thing I was concerned about when I bought them was that they would fall apart before I could germinate the seeds (because they are biodegradable and staying wet most of the time). However, no problem with that at all. I definitely plan on buying more trays!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Watson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My son's school needed biodegradable pots for seedlings and these were perfect. ( didnt have any egg cartons available ) I also appreciated how fast I received them so kudos to the company. I also do a lot of gardening so I can put them to use soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and flimsy, only suitable for one short term use.
customer_reviews.text: These products were so thin, you could easily put a finger through them or any tool you were using on the seeds. They also stuck together, so I ruined several of them while trying to pull them apart from shipping. And I was being extremely patient and careful. I would not buy this brand again, I am saving up my egg cartons to use for next year, as well as toilet paper rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Sixties Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: 5th grader's science fair project and we were running out of time! These little kits were absolutely perfect! Thank you for the help with my son's project AND for helping to cultivate his new love for gardening! Signed, Grateful Mom
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Love

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work well they kind of fell apart a ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well they kind of fell apart a little when watered before planting but worked perfectly. I broke the starter shell open and planted to give the roots slighter easier growth.
customer_reviews.author: falcor

customer_reviews.title: I would still recommend...maybe
customer_reviews.text: They sucked up water very quickly and now my seedlings dirt shows signs of mold. I'm sure I'm not using them correctly but my seeds have begun sprouting. The cups broke and separated when I first took them out of the package wrap. Update: all of my sprouted seedlings have died 😞
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Tray
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do a cub scout project with my den. They withstood the test of 7 8-year-old boys so they are great in my book! My only complaint is that I wish there were more i.d. sticks. If you want to plant seeds in all of the spots (which I did) you don't have enough to mark them. Not a huge deal - I was able to use small craft sticks instead.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Pot sucks up all the water I spray; seeds won't sprout?
customer_reviews.text: I just started using these planters on April 2nd (14 days ago). So far, my seeds have not sprouted despite regular watering and sitting under a grow light, except one that immediately wilted the day after sprouting. I am not sure if the seeds are duds or if it is the planters, but I have noticed that the soil is bone dry almost immediately after spraying them with water. I find myself having to water them several times a day only to find the soil bone dry again. I think the pots are absorbing all the water. Any tips would be appreciated, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schumaker

customer_reviews.title: You have to remove from tray or break the tray open
customer_reviews.text: This year i turned over my garden to find that these pots did not degrade and held the roots in which stunted the growth of my tomato plants. I was wondering why they stayed small. The tomato i planted without starter tray rooted and grew fine.
customer_reviews.author: Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These came on time and in good condition. (not smashed) I didn't give points for giftable but I suppose if you have a gardener in your life and feel so inclined they would be giftable as they are wrapped and nicely presented. They are perfect for starting seeds and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Trailnut

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Theyre great! After they get wet they want to fall apart at the seams between each pot but thats ok! They do theyre job well. I had to put mine on something to keep them flat as well before I planted them into a bigger pot.
customer_reviews.author: Squid Smith

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. As another reviewer remarked these have a very strong toxic odor. I can only think of one reason why inexpensive paper products like these would have such a strong smell and it has nothing to do with healthy gardening.
customer_reviews.author: R. CONSOLI

customer_reviews.title: Almost 100% success rate for seed germination for three different types of veggies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use with my students. They LOVED using the spray bottles to moisten them and plant the seedlings. We had almost 100% success rate of germination with a full set of these pots. So far they have transplanted nicely into the garden beds. I read mixed reviews about using these types of peat pots but I can say that the roots of this particular product had no problem busting through the peat when watered regularly.
customer_reviews.author: sthiss

customer_reviews.title: Great for transplanting directly into garden
customer_reviews.text: These are great because you can transplant your seeds without having to take them out of the container. The seeds adjust better to the outdoors and the containers allow the roots to grow stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like these as much as the jiffy pots. I’ve never had luck germinating in these (as opposed to pellets) and they’re too small to transfer into after germination. They soak easily and then fall apart too.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfict size
customer_reviews.text: Plant your indoor seeds in these guys and then transplant them right in the garden. I cut the bottom off (or at least open) and they decompose in the garden. It’s less stress for the plant as they remain in their own soil during transplant.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Montrose

customer_reviews.title: Stunt the plant growth
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are even for growing seedlings...my plants are so small and many of them did not grow at all in these pods... I bought cheap plastic ones and the plants grew faster and bigger...
customer_reviews.author: Bozmom

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Solid seller.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed/wanted for my seed starters. The product description is spot on. There was a slight shipping delay but the sellers made it right. I would definitely recommend and purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: rockinrn01

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping and easy one-click ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Perfect size to fit in my planting trays. I love that I can put my seedlings straight into the ground without having to disturb their roots. Can't wait to start my crops for this spring!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Biodegrade too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I can already tell these are not going to last long enough to get my plants in the ground. I will have to put these inside another more sturdy container. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Annalyst

customer_reviews.title: Lots of broken ones
customer_reviews.text: These come jammed together and shrink wrapped. Almost impossible to pull the trays apart without damage. They do not decompose
customer_reviews.author: stan pappy

customer_reviews.title: Just Plant!
customer_reviews.text: These are fine. Kind of hard to separate without tearing. Way cheaper at Home Depot but I will support small businesses if I can afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ison

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The planting containers arrived but no pods! It specifically says you get the planting containers AND peat pods for planting your seed in. Wrong! False advertisement at its best. DON’T by this product you will be sorely disappointed for the massive price.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sankey

customer_reviews.title: Good trays but hard to get apart.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a school project. However, they're hard to get separated and we broke a few in the process. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love peat boxes
customer_reviews.text: What I really like is the ability to stick the whole thing in the ground as opposed to pulling the plant out of plastic. The roots grow right into it and through it.
customer_reviews.author: Marty W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for starting seeds indoors under light
customer_reviews.text: Same as those sold in in the big box hardware store. Very sturdy when potting soil and seeds are placed in them. I've planted six trays and they are fine. Good gardening product
customer_reviews.author: OldRetiree

customer_reviews.title: Good product and value
customer_reviews.text: These are great little starter cells, and are of good value. I’ve ordered twice. The first time they came in perfect condition. The second time, the shipper wasn’t quite as gentle and a couple of cells were broken. The manufacturer says they are looking into this.
customer_reviews.author: Willy’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Mildewed quickly
customer_reviews.text: These pots held up okay without falling apart. The problem is that they grew mildew quickly even with ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Please send your discount you offered so that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Please send your discount you offered so that I can apply it to my next order. Peat Pot Seedling Starter Trays
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Firm good quilty peat pots .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an early spring garden. They where shipped in a reasonable time frame. Even though I have not used them . They look like one of the best peat pot I have seen in a while and shipped with out damage.
customer_reviews.author: michael jones

customer_reviews.title: Great! 10/10 would use this seller again!
customer_reviews.text: The pots are all I expected and are working well! I’ve transplanted a few plants I started in these and they’re doing great! Also was contacted personally by the seller. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: rmtb

customer_reviews.title: The perfect garden starts with a good tray
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. Just what I’ve been looking for. Will definitely be a return customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kit came on time as promised. Packaging was good; no damage to the peat pots or trays.
customer_reviews.text: I am using the peat pots to start some Red Bud seeds. After the plants get started and the ground is warm enough, I can plant them without disturbing the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice but way to small for what I needed will keep and find something else to use them for
customer_reviews.author: Gary Helton

customer_reviews.title: Melting
customer_reviews.text: It melts once you water it. Personally I’m not a fan. I may use those pill ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Miley Song

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy seedling trays with no drainage holes.
customer_reviews.text: Just put my starters in. These trays are a good size and not too flimsy like I thought they might be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it degraded very fast thus impeding root growth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and falling apart after first watering
customer_reviews.text: After only 1 day of watering, they have already started to fall apart :( I have used peat and cow manure player trays often, and these are not good quality compared to others I have used. They are also much smaller than I was expecting. Overall very disappointed considering how expensive they are! I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but the drain holes are missing!
customer_reviews.text: I had to drill drain holes in the bottoms myself. As-is the unit can overhold water. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic starter trays
customer_reviews.text: These are great little starter cubes, look like they'll have no trouble decomposing when it's time to plant them in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: DrMelody

customer_reviews.title: Great valuePeat Pot Trays
customer_reviews.text: These are working great and easy to use in getting your seeds started early
customer_reviews.author: Ben Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my kid's school project. I like how they can just be planted without needing to transplant the plant. Environment-friendly!
customer_reviews.author: tim-o-t

customer_reviews.title: Great little peat pots, and great service!
customer_reviews.text: These peat pots are just the right size for me. They arrived when promised. I'd get these again.
customer_reviews.author: K.Wester

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality starters, bottoms popped out easily when they were ready to go in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Product as described by seller
customer_reviews.text: Product received in a timely fashion and in good fashion.
customer_reviews.author: larry penning

customer_reviews.title: Healthy peat pots ready to go.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as stated and arrived before time. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chicquita MB Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: I have one major complaint these do not decompose in the ground. You might as well use a egg carton.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Seed starting made simple
customer_reviews.text: I have trays left from last year so just needed more pots. Wrapped well and ready to go
customer_reviews.author: roy in cleveland

customer_reviews.title: All grown up!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these to get my starts and then planted them. My garden grows well.
customer_reviews.author: WWolf

customer_reviews.title: Excited about starting my garden
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving the trays, I love the fact they are biodegradable so that you're able to transfer it in pot directly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Castro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible seed cup
customer_reviews.text: please take them back I will buy some in local store
customer_reviews.author: docto rgadget

customer_reviews.title: Good value for permeable seed trays.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for permeable seed trays. Looking forward to lots of flowers this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: Order was not complete (no peat pods)
customer_reviews.text: I received the plant pots but there were not peat pods or plastic stakes.
customer_reviews.author: joseph s kudla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use arrived on time and just planted away eager to see the results
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Y. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to other gardeners
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, arrived on time and was not damaged. We already have seeds planted in half of them. Would recommend and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the plastic tabs or wrap, I hate plastic & wish it was banned. Love the seedling trays though, will be ordering more shortly. 🌱🧡😊
customer_reviews.author: Marymary A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Couple with 7.5” vented domes for humidity
customer_reviews.text: Coupled these with 7.5in. vented domes to start tomatoes and basil. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - No problems with shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great Product - No problems with shipping Already started planting.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seed Starting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion and were just as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting seeds
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller peat pots for starting seeds inside. These are conveniently connected together and work well for sprouting larger quantities of seedlings in a compact space.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Arrived in good shape. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great for seed starting
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and shipped fast. Perfect for organic seed starting.

customer_reviews.title: They are very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They are already helping me get a headstart in my gardening for the new year. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and a good deal. Happy happy and ready for spring.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from the description. I’m very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality = Happy Seedlings
customer_reviews.text: The trays came exactly as promised and were even nicer than described. Excellent seller to do business with. I'll be a repeat customer!

customer_reviews.title: Grow seeds
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I'm growing seeds for a number of plants that would be way too expensive to buy outright.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. What else can I say? ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. What else can I say? I'll tell you more in May, when I xplant the seedlings.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping and A quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just as described I will definitely buy again Thanks Very Much

customer_reviews.title: peat pots arrived on time and there were no broken pots well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the pots convenient for a small home garden. I planted zinnias and two different types of native milkweed plants

customer_reviews.title: plants
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of now starting my plants for this year with quality parts

customer_reviews.title: MOLD MOLD MOLD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The peat pots grew mold which ran over onto the soil I'd heated to 300 degrees for half an hour ruining the plant. I suggest spraying them with a fungicide before using and keep them away from your other plants.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived in a timely fashion & completely intact.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I'm new to gardening and this has helped my seedlings start. I will order more.

customer_reviews.title: They are good size for seed starters
customer_reviews.text: They are good size for seed starters. However, plastic containers would serve much better. This material absorbs the water and tears easily, and seedlings' roots grow easily into the walls, so be careful when removing them from the pots.

product_meta.title: Daniel's Plants Plantable Seed Starter Tray - 10 Seedling Trays | 100 Peat Pots | Biodegradable Compostable Planting Pots | Peat Pots for Seedlings Seed Starter Tray | Bonus 10 Plant Labels
product_meta.description:
Size:100 Cell Tray

The Perfect Organic Garden Seedling Trays To Grow Your Saplings & Starters - Start Today!

Do you want a greener thumb - a way to increase your changes of planting success? 

Are you sick and tired of planting and growing your favorite plant saplings with love and care, only to see them wither from the shock when you try to transplant them to your garden? 

If that's the case, then we have the perfect product for you. These amazing organic peat pot trays will prove to be exactly what you need! 

Say Goodbye To Transplant Shock & Root Circulation

As any agriculturist or gardening enthusiast will tell you, planting saplings and seedlings is a tricky business. They often require to be initially grown into a small peat pot and then transplanted - a process many of them aren't strong enough to survive. 

These amazing seed trays are here, however, to provide a simple solution to that millennia-old problem. Just grow your seedlings, and then plant them in your yard or garden without removing them from the trays. 

No transplant shock, no root circulation, and no withered plants and flowers - it's that simple! 

100% Natural, Organic & Biodegradable

The secret to these unique starter peat trays is that they're made from nothing but spruce fibers and peat moss. This makes them 100% natural, organic, and biodegradable. They are sustainably produced and environmentally friendly, and can be used for aquaponics and hydroponics, as well as for traditional growing methods! 

So, What Are You Still Waiting For? 

Order Your Own Premium Organic Peat Pots Tray Pack By Daniel's Plants Right Away! 

Just Click "Add To Cart"!
feature_bullets: GET YOUR DREAM GARDEN STARTED: Forget about plastic or ceramic plant pots - they're only good for indoor decorative plants. With these organic peat pot trays, you can finally start working towards your dream garden! The right way!
GREAT FOR SAPLINGS & STARTERS: With a 1.75” diameter, these organic seedling peat trays are perfectly sized for starting flowers, herbs, and vegetable saplings like tomatoes and cucumbers.
PREVENT TRANSPLANT SHOCK: By becoming one with the root ball and promoting aeration, these amazing peat pellet trays are great for transplanting plants without causing root circulation or harm.

ECO FRIENDLY MATERIALS: When it comes to our peat seed starter trays for seedlings, we use nothing but 100% natural and biodegradable pots with organic peat. It literally doesn't get more eco-friendly than that!
GET THEM RISK-FREE: If these bulk peat pots fail to meet your expectations, don't hesitate to contact us and benefit from our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee policy!
